ygData.subject: Experience implementing custom media handlers
ygData.msgSnippet: Slightly OT, but what are people experiences in implementing custom client-side media type handlers? I mean registering a helper application to handle, say,

Slightly OT, but what are people experiences in implementing custom client-=
side media type handlers? I mean registering a helper application to handle=
, say, content of type application/vnd.my-cool-stuff when a representation =
of this type is returned in response to a browser request.

What's the best=
 option to do this (both registration as well as actual content handling) i=
n a cross-platform way?

Thanks,
Stefan

.com/blog/st/
